snippet: British Cycling appointed Stephen Park as its new performance director on Friday with the task of directing the fortunes of a hugely successful Olympic sport for Team GB amid a period of considerable turmoil....
lead_paragraph: British Cycling appointed Stephen Park as its new performance director on Friday with the task of directing the fortunes of a hugely successful Olympic sport for Team GB amid a period of considerable turmoil.

headline.main: British Cycling Appoints Park as Performance Director
headline.print_headline: British Cycling Appoints Park as Performance Director
